issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.cakeresume.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cakeresume.com%2F) ### Comment Username: @fykuan > Whenever AdGuard for Mac is enabled, the website keeps loading forever. Once I disable AdGuard for Mac, the website shows instantly. ### Screenshots
